            # app/controllers/admin/application_controller.rb

            class Admin::ApplicationController < ApplicationController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              include Pundit::Authorization
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user! # Ensure the user is logged in for admin namespace access
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authorize_admin_access! # Ensure only certain users have access to admin
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              after_action :verify_authorized # Enforce policy checks for all actions
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              after_action :verify_policy_scoped, only: :index # Enforce scoping for index actions
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue_from Pundit::NotAuthorizedError do
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to root_path, alert: "You are not authorized to access this area."
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

              def authorize_admin_access!
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use Pundit policy check for access to the Admin namespace
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize :admin, :access?
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      21.

              # POST /countries or /countries.json
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                @country = Country.new(country_params)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @country
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                if @country.save
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_country_url(@country), notice: "Country was successfully created."
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              # PATCH/PUT /countries/1 or /countries/1.json
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

              def update
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                @country = Country.find(params[:id])
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @country
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                if @country.update(country_params)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_country_url(@country), notice: "Country was successfully updated."
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

              # DELETE /countries/1 or /countries/1.json
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                @country = Country.find(params[:id])
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @country
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                @country.destroy!
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to admin_countries_path, notice: "Country was successfully deleted."
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

              # Only allow a list of trusted parameters through.
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

              def country_params
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                params.expect(country: [ :name, :description, :comments ])
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      70.

            class Admin::DashboardController < Admin::ApplicationController
          
      3.

              skip_after_action :verify_policy_scoped, only: :index, raise: false

      5.

              def index

                @mr_character_count = MrCharacter.count

            # app/controllers/admin/database_exports_controller.rb

            require 'open3'
          
      3.

      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            class Admin::DatabaseExportsController < Admin::ApplicationController
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              skip_after_action :verify_policy_scoped, only: :export
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              def export
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize :database_export, :export?
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                export_type = params[:export_type] || 'lookup_tables'
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Database export started by user #{current_user.id} - type: #{export_type}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                # Base tables to always exclude for security reasons
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                base_excluded_tables = [
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  'users',
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  'trusted_devices',
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  'user_roles',
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  'roles',
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  'role_permissions',
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  'permissions',
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  'versions',
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  'active_storage_attachments',
          
      24.

                  'active_storage_blobs',
          
      25.

                  'active_storage_variant_records',
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  'solid_queue_blocked_executions',
          
      27.

                  'solid_queue_claimed_executions',

                  'solid_queue_failed_executions',

                  'solid_queue_jobs',

                  'solid_queue_pauses',

                  'solid_queue_processes',

                  'solid_queue_recurring_executions',

                  'solid_queue_scheduled_executions',

                  'solid_queue_semaphores',
          
      36.

                  'schema_migrations',
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  'ar_internal_metadata'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                # User input tables to exclude for lookup table exports
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                user_input_tables = [
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  'all_group_mushrooms',
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  'articles',
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  'cluster_mushrooms',
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  'image_mushrooms',
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  'mushroom_projects',
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  'mushrooms'
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                # Configure export based on type
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                case export_type
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                when 'lookup_tables'
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Option 1: Lookup tables only (exclude user data and user input)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  excluded_tables = base_excluded_tables + user_input_tables
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  include_only_tables = nil
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  filename_prefix = 'mrdbid_lookup_tables'
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                when 'lookup_no_mblist'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Option 2: Lookup tables without the large mb_lists table
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  excluded_tables = base_excluded_tables + user_input_tables + ['mb_lists']
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  include_only_tables = nil
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  filename_prefix = 'mrdbid_lookup_no_mblist'
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                when 'mblist_only'
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Option 3: Only the mb_lists table
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  excluded_tables = []
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  include_only_tables = ['mb_lists']
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  filename_prefix = 'mrdbid_mblist_only'
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise "Invalid export_type: #{export_type}"
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                # Database configuration
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                config = ActiveRecord::Base.connection_db_config.configuration_hash
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                database = config[:database]
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                username = config[:username]
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                password = config[:password]
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                host = config[:host] || 'localhost'
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Exporting database: #{database} from host: #{host}"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build mysqldump command options based on export type
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                if include_only_tables
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  # For mblist_only: only export specified tables
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  table_options = include_only_tables.join(' ')
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Including only tables: #{include_only_tables.join(', ')}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  # For other exports: exclude specified tables
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  ignore_tables = excluded_tables.map { |table| "--ignore-table=#{database}.#{table}" }.join(' ')
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  table_options = ignore_tables
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Excluding #{excluded_tables.length} tables"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create filename with timestamp
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                timestamp = Time.current.strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S')
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                filename = "#{filename_prefix}_#{timestamp}.sql"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create temporary files
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                temp_file = Tempfile.new([filename, '.sql'])
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                config_file = Tempfile.new(['mysql_config', '.cnf'])
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Write MySQL config file with credentials (more secure than command line)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                  config_file.write("[client]\n")
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  config_file.write("user=#{username}\n")
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  config_file.write("password=#{password}\n") if password.present?
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  config_file.write("host=#{host}\n")
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  config_file.close
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "MySQL config file created at: #{config_file.path}"
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Build mysqldump command using config file
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  if include_only_tables
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                    # For include_only: specify tables directly after database name
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                    command = [
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                      'mysqldump',
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                      "--defaults-file=#{config_file.path}",
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                      database,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                      *include_only_tables
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                    ]
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                    # For exclusions: use --ignore-table options
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                    command = [
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                      'mysqldump',
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                      "--defaults-file=#{config_file.path}",
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                      *table_options.split(' '),
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                      database
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                    ]
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Executing mysqldump command for export type: #{export_type}"
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Execute mysqldump and capture output
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  stdout, stderr, status = Open3.capture3(*command)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  unless status.success?
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                    error_msg = "mysqldump failed with exit code #{status.exitstatus}: #{stderr}"
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error error_msg
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise error_msg
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Write output to temp file
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  temp_file.write(stdout)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                  temp_file.close
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  file_size = File.size(temp_file.path)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Database export completed. File size: #{file_size} bytes"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Validate file size
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  if file_size == 0
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise "Database export produced empty file. stderr: #{stderr}"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Move temp file to shared tmp directory for nginx to serve
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use shared path so files persist across deployments
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  shared_tmp_dir = Rails.root.join('..', '..', 'shared', 'public', 'tmp', 'exports')
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  FileUtils.mkdir_p(shared_tmp_dir)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  final_path = shared_tmp_dir.join(filename)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                  FileUtils.mv(temp_file.path, final_path)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Set permissions so nginx can read the file
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  FileUtils.chmod(0644, final_path)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  temp_file.close(true) # Close without unlinking since we moved it
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Database export file moved to: #{final_path}"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use X-Accel-Redirect for nginx to handle large file download
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  # This prevents Rails timeout issues with large files
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  response.headers['Content-Type'] = 'application/sql'
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  response.headers['Content-Disposition'] = "attachment; filename=\"#{filename}\""
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  response.headers['X-Accel-Redirect'] = "/tmp/exports/#{filename}"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  response.headers['X-Accel-Buffering'] = 'no'
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Schedule cleanup after 1 hour
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  CleanupExportJob.set(wait: 1.hour).perform_later(final_path.to_s) if defined?(CleanupExportJob)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Database export file sent to user #{current_user.id} via X-Accel-Redirect"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  render body: nil
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Database export error: #{e.class.name} - #{e.message}"
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to admin_root_path, alert: "Failed to export database: #{e.message}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                ensure
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Clean up temp files (but not the moved export file)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  begin
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                    config_file.unlink if config_file
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Don't unlink temp_file here as it was moved to public/tmp/exports
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.info "Temp files cleaned up"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                  rescue => cleanup_error
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "Error cleaning up temp files: #{cleanup_error.message}"
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      194.

            class Admin::ImageMushroomsController < Admin::ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_image_mushroom, only: %i[show edit update destroy]
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_collections, only: [:new, :create, :edit, :update]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize ImageMushroom
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                @image_mushrooms = policy_scope(ImageMushroom.includes(:mushroom, :part).order(:image_name))
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      11.

              def show

              def new
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                @image_mushroom = ImageMushroom.new
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                # Build from top-level params; do not rely on current_user or nesting
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                @image_mushroom = ImageMushroom.new(image_mushroom_params)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                # Accept optional mushroom_id provided outside nested route without touching the association
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:mushroom_id].present? && @image_mushroom.mushroom_id.blank?
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  @image_mushroom.mushroom_id = params[:mushroom_id]
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                if @image_mushroom.save
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to [:admin, @image_mushroom], notice: "Image successfully uploaded."
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Reload data for form rendering without touching associations
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom = Mushroom.find_by(id: @image_mushroom.mushroom_id)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  @parts = Part.all.order(:name)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

              def edit
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushrooms = Mushroom.all
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                @parts = Part.all
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              def update
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  if @image_mushroom.update(image_mushroom_params)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to [:admin, @image_mushroom], notice: 'Image Mushroom was successfully updated.'
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to [:admin, @image_mushroom], alert: 'Changes could not be applied.'
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue ActiveRecord::InvalidForeignKey, ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to [:admin, @image_mushroom], alert: 'Invalid change ignored.'
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                @image_mushroom.destroy
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to admin_image_mushrooms_url, notice: 'Image Mushroom was successfully deleted.'
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65.

              private
          
      66.

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            module Admin

              class MrCharactersSourcesController < ApplicationController
          
      8.

                before_action :authenticate_user!

                # Avoid Pundit's verify_policy_scoped check on a non-routed index here

                skip_after_action :verify_policy_scoped, only: [:index], raise: false

                def show

                  unless File.exist?(csv_path)

            class Admin::SourceDataController < Admin::ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_source_data, only: %i[show edit update destroy]
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /source_datas
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize SourceData
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @source_data = policy_scope(
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  SourceData.includes(:source_data_type)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Search by title or author (works with or without type filter)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:q].present?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  term_raw = params[:q].to_s.strip
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  term = ActiveRecord::Base.sanitize_sql_like(term_raw)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  @source_data = @source_data.where(
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                    "title LIKE ? OR author LIKE ?",
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                    "%#{term}%", "%#{term}%"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                # Apply source_data_type filter if present
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @source_data = @source_data.where(source_data_type_id: params[:source_data_type_id]) if params[:source_data_type_id].present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # Smart sorting: ignore leading articles (A, An, The)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                # Sort by title with articles stripped, case-insensitive
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                @source_data = @source_data.sort_by do |sd|
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  title = sd.title.to_s
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Remove leading "A ", "An ", "The " (case-insensitive)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  normalized = title.sub(/\A(a|an|the)\s+/i, '')
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  normalized.downcase
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                # Populate source_data_types dropdown - only those that have source_data
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                @source_data_types = SourceDataType
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where(id: SourceData.select(:source_data_type_id).distinct)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .order(:name)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .pluck(:name, :id)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /source_datas/1
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

              def show
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @source_data
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /source_datas/new
          
      47.

              def new

      51.

              # POST /source_datas
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      54.

            class Admin::StatesController < Admin::ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_state, only: %i[show edit update destroy]
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /states
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /states
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize State
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                scope = policy_scope(State).preload(:country)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                @states = params[:country_id].present? ? scope.where(country_id: params[:country_id]) : scope.all
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:country_id].present?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  render partial: "admin/states/select", locals: { states: @states }
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :index
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              end

      6.

            # This controller manages the pivot table all_group_mushrooms between all_groups and mushrooms

              def create

                @all_groups = @mushroom ? AllGroup.where(user_id: @mushroom.user_id) : AllGroup.none
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom && AllGroup.where(id: @all_group_mushroom.all_group_id, user_id: @mushroom.user_id).exists? && @all_group_mushroom.save
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36.

            class ApplicationController < ActionController::Base
          
      5.

              before_action :set_paper_trail_whodunnit

              before_action :set_view_debug_identifier, if: -> { Rails.env.development? || Rails.env.test? }  # see file name on each page
          
      7.

              include Pundit::Authorization # Updated inclusion for Pundit

              # In development/test, ensure actions are authorized and index actions are policy-scoped.

              # Skips Devise controllers to avoid noise in auth flows.

              if Rails.env.development? || Rails.env.test?

              def mr_characters

      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107.

      108.

                              all_chars = all_chars.reject { |c| entered_ids.include?(c.id) }
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                            end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115.

                            # Search by name (case-insensitive)

                            all_chars

                              .select { |c|
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                                c.name.downcase.include?(query) &&
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                                c.display_option_id != 1 && # exclude "do not display"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                                c.display_option_id != 6    # exclude "color" (has special UI)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                              }
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                              .first(20)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                              .map { |c|
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                                {
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                                  id: c.id,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                                  name: "[#{c.part&.name}] #{c.name.tr('_', ' ')}",
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                                  part_name: c.part&.name
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                                }
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                              }
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                          else
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                            []
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                          end
          
      134.

              def create

                @cluster_mushroom = ClusterMushroom.new(cluster_mushroom_params)

    30. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom = Mushroom.find_by(id: cluster_mushroom_params[:mushroom_id])
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                # Disable strict_loading for error rendering
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                @cluster_mushroom.strict_loading!(false)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                # Assign mushroom association to avoid strict_loading violations in view
          
      34.

                @cluster_mushroom.mushroom = @mushroom if @mushroom
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                # Only clusters owned by the mushroom owner should be selectable
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                @clusters = @mushroom ? Cluster.where(user_id: @mushroom.user_id) : Cluster.none
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                # Ownership guard: cluster must belong to the mushroom owner
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom && Cluster.where(id: @cluster_mushroom.cluster_id, user_id: @mushroom.user_id).exists? && @cluster_mushroom.save

    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to cluster_mushroom_path(@cluster_mushroom), notice: "Cluster mushroom was successfully created."
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  @cluster_mushroom.errors.add(:cluster_id, "is not owned by the mushroom owner") if @mushroom && @cluster_mushroom.cluster_id.present? && !Cluster.where(id: @cluster_mushroom.cluster_id, user_id: @mushroom.user_id).exists?

                end

              def destroy

                @cluster.destroy!
          
      74.

            class ContactsController < ApplicationController

              skip_before_action :authenticate_user!
