              def create
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                # Honeypot check - reject if the hidden field is filled
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:website_url].present?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.warn("Honeypot triggered: website_url filled - possible spam")
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:notice] = "Thanks! Your message has been sent."
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  return redirect_to contact_path
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                name = params[:name].to_s.strip
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                email = params[:email].to_s.strip
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                subject = params[:subject].to_s.strip
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                message = params[:message].to_s
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                recipient = params[:recipient].to_s.strip
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                if name.blank? || email.blank? || subject.blank? || message.blank?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:alert] = "Please provide your name, email, subject, and a message."
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  return redirect_to contact_path
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                # Validate recipient is one of the allowed addresses
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                allowed_recipients = ['contact@mrdbid.com', 'webmaster@mrdbid.com', 'will@mrdbid.com']
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                recipient = 'contact@mrdbid.com' unless allowed_recipients.include?(recipient)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  ContactMailer.contact_message(
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    name: name,
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    email: email,
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                    subject: subject,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                    message: message,
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                    recipient: recipient
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  ).deliver_later
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:notice] = "Thanks! Your message has been sent."
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error("Contact mail failed: #{e.class} - #{e.message}")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  flash[:alert] = "Sorry, we could not send your message. Please try again later."
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to contact_path
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            end

            class GenusMushroomsController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      5.

              skip_after_action :verify_authorized, raise: false

              # POST /genus_mushrooms.json
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                @genus_mushroom = GenusMushroom.new(genus_mushroom_params)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @genus_mushroom if respond_to?(:authorize)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                if @genus_mushroom.save
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: true, id: @genus_mushroom.id }, status: :created
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: false, errors: @genus_mushroom.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotUnique
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                render json: { success: false, errors: ["This genus is already associated with this mushroom"] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20.

              # DELETE /genus_mushrooms/destroy_by_relation.json

    21. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy_by_relation
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @genus_mushroom = GenusMushroom.find_by(mushroom_id: params[:mushroom_id], genus_id: params[:genus_id])
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                if @genus_mushroom
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  authorize @genus_mushroom if respond_to?(:authorize)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  @genus_mushroom.destroy
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: true }
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: false, message: "Not found" }, status: :not_found
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                render json: { success: false, message: e.message }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34.

            class ImageMushroomsController < ApplicationController

              include Pundit::Authorization

              before_action :set_image_mushroom, only: %i[show edit update destroy]

              def new

    16.

    17. 
            

            
              
            

                unless @mushroom

    19. 
            

            
              
            

                end

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

              def create
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                @image_mushroom = ImageMushroom.new(image_mushroom_params)

    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                # Prefer nested route param, else fall back to hidden field
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                route_parent_id = params[:mushroom_id].presence

                form_parent_id  = image_mushroom_params[:mushroom_id].presence
          
      33.

                parent_id = route_parent_id || form_parent_id

                @image_mushroom.mushroom_id = parent_id

    46.

      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47.

              def edit

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushrooms = Mushroom.all
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                @parts = Part.all
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              def update
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  if @image_mushroom.update(image_mushroom_params)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                    mushroom = Mushroom.find(@image_mushroom.mushroom_id)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to edit_mushroom_path(mushroom), notice: 'Image was successfully updated.'
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                    @mushrooms = Mushroom.all
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                    @parts = Part.all
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                    render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue ActiveRecord::InvalidForeignKey, ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushrooms = Mushroom.all
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  @parts = Part.all
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72.

      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76.

      77.

              def destroy

                authorize @image_mushroom
          
      79.

                parent_id = @image_mushroom.mushroom_id
          
      80.

                @image_mushroom.destroy
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to mushroom_path(parent_id), notice: 'Image was successfully deleted.'
          
      82.

              end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      85.

              def create

              # Boolean helpers

              def booleanish_display_option?(mr_character_id)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                mc = MrCharacter.includes(:display_option).find_by(id: mr_character_id)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                return false unless mc&.display_option&.name
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                %w[boolean_yes_no boolean_true_false boolean_present_absent checkbox].include?(mc.display_option.name)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              def normalize_boolean_string(value)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                v = value.to_s.strip.downcase
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                return "true"  if %w[true yes present y on 1 checked].include?(v)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                return "false" if %w[false no absent n off 0 unchecked].include?(v)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fallback: empty becomes false, anything else stays as-is to avoid data loss
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                return "false" if v.blank?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                value.to_s
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      59.

            class MushroomComparisonsController < ApplicationController

              # MUSHROOM COMPARISONS CONTROLLER

              # ============================================================================

              # Manages comparison operations between mushrooms based on character traits.

              #

              # AUTHENTICATION & AUTHORIZATION:

              # - Uses Devise for authentication (authenticate_user!)

              # - Users can compare any mushroom (regardless of ownership)

              #

              # - Eager loads associations to prevent N+1 queries

              #

              def index
          
      31.

                # Check if mushroom has minimum characters

                  @comparisons = []

      39.

      40.

                # Get all completed comparisons for this mushroom, sorted by similarity

      49.

              def create

                # Check if mushroom has minimum characters

      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75.

      76.

                # Enqueue comparison job
          
      78.

      79.

      83.

              private
          
      85.

              def set_mushroom
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom = Mushroom.find(params[:mushroom_id])
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89.

    90. 
            

            
              
            

              def load_mushroom_characters(mushroom)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                # Returns array of hashes with character details
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                mushroom.mr_character_mushrooms
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                        .includes(mr_character: [:part, :display_option])
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                        .map do |mcm|
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                    id: mcm.mr_character_id,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                    name: mcm.mr_character.name,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    part: mcm.mr_character.part.name,
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                    value: mcm.character_value
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      103.

              def create

                @mushroom_plant = MushroomPlant.new(mushroom_plant_params)

    10. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @mushroom_plant if respond_to?(:authorize)

                if @mushroom_plant.save
          
      12.

                  render json: { success: true, id: @mushroom_plant.id }, status: :created

                else
          
      14.

      16.

              def destroy_by_relation
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom_plant = MushroomPlant.find_by(mushroom_id: params[:mushroom_id], plant_id: params[:plant_id])
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom_plant && ( !respond_to?(:authorize) || authorize(@mushroom_plant) )
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom_plant.destroy
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: true }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27.

            class MushroomSearchController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @query = params[:q]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @fungus_type_id = params[:fungus_type_id]
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @character_filters = params[:characters]&.to_unsafe_h || {}
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                # Start with user's mushrooms
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushrooms = current_user.mushrooms.non_templates
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                               .includes(:fungus_type, :country, :state, :genera, :species,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                                         image_mushrooms: [:part, { image_file_attachment: :blob }])
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                # Apply text search if query present
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                if @query.present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushrooms = @mushrooms.fulltext_search(@query)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter by fungus type
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                if @fungus_type_id.present?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushrooms = @mushrooms.where(fungus_type_id: @fungus_type_id)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter by characters - handle nested hash structure from dynamic form
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                if @character_filters.present? && @character_filters.any?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  @character_filters.each do |key, value|
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Handle both direct character_id=>value pairs and nested new_X hashes
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                    if value.is_a?(Hash) && value['character_id'].present? && value['value'].present?
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Dynamic filter: {new_1: {character_id: "5", value: "red"}}
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                      @mushrooms = @mushrooms.with_character(value['character_id'], value['value'])
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                    elsif value.present? && !value.is_a?(Hash)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Direct filter: {character_id: value}
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                      @mushrooms = @mushrooms.with_character(key, value)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushrooms = @mushrooms.distinct
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                               .page(params[:page])
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                               .per(20)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get available fungus types for filter dropdown
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                @fungus_types = FungusType.order(:name)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get commonly searched characters for filter options
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                @common_characters = MrCharacter
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .where(display_option_id: [2, 3, 4, 5, 6]) # Exclude "do not display"
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .order(:name)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                                      .limit(50)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      52.

            class MushroomSpeciesController < ApplicationController
          
      4.

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              skip_after_action :verify_authorized, raise: false

              # POST /mushroom_species.json
          
      8.

              def create
          
      9.

                @ms = MushroomSpecies.new(mushroom_species_params)

                authorize @ms if respond_to?(:authorize)
          
      11.

                if @ms.save

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotUnique

      18.

      19.

      20.

              # DELETE /mushroom_species/destroy_by_relation.json
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy_by_relation
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @ms = MushroomSpecies.find_by(mushroom_id: params[:mushroom_id], species_id: params[:species_id])
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                if @ms && (!respond_to?(:authorize) || authorize(@ms))
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  @ms.destroy
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: true }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: false, message: "Not found" }, status: :not_found
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32.

              def mushroom_species_params

            class MushroomTreesController < ApplicationController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              skip_after_action :verify_authorized, raise: false
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /mushroom_trees.json
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom_tree = MushroomTree.new(mushroom_tree_params)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @mushroom_tree if respond_to?(:authorize)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom_tree.save
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: true, id: @mushroom_tree.id }, status: :created
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: false, errors: @mushroom_tree.errors.full_messages }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotUnique
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                render json: { success: false, errors: ["This tree is already associated with this mushroom"] }, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              # DELETE /mushroom_trees/destroy_by_relation.json
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy_by_relation
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom_tree = MushroomTree.find_by(mushroom_id: params[:mushroom_id], tree_id: params[:tree_id])
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom_tree && ( !respond_to?(:authorize) || authorize(@mushroom_tree) )
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom_tree.destroy
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: true }
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  render json: { success: false, message: "Not found" }, status: :not_found
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

            class MushroomsController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

              # ============================================================================
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              # MUSHROOMS CONTROLLER - User's Personal Mushroom Collection Management
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # ============================================================================
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # This controller manages CRUD operations for mushrooms owned by individual users.
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              # Each mushroom belongs to a single user (see app/models/mushroom.rb).
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              # AUTHENTICATION & AUTHORIZATION:
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Uses Devise for authentication (authenticate_user!)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Uses Pundit for authorization (see app/policies/mushroom_policy.rb)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Users can only view/edit/delete their own mushrooms
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              # PERFORMANCE NOTES:
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Uses eager loading to prevent N+1 queries
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Index action uses pagination (25 items per page via Kaminari)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              # - All queries include necessary associations to avoid multiple DB calls
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              #   CRITICAL AUTHORIZATION FLOW:
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              # 1. authenticate_user! runs first (except index - allows public viewing of empty list)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              # 2. set_mushroom loads the record for show/edit/update/destroy
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              # 3. authorize_mushroom checks Pundit policy (user must own the mushroom)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              # ============================================================================
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              # Pundit setup
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              include Pundit::Authorization
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authenticate_user!, except: [:index, :show] # Allow public to view index and show for demo
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :set_mushroom, only: %i[show edit update destroy edit_characters clone_characters]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              before_action :authorize_mushroom, except: %i[index new create export_pdf clone_characters]
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /mushrooms
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                if user_signed_in?
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ============================================================================
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  # EAGER LOADING - CRITICAL FOR RAILS 8 STRICT_LOADING
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ============================================================================
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Must include ALL associations used in views to prevent StrictLoadingViolationError
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - fungus_type: Used for grouping and display
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - country, state: Used for location display
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - genera, species: Used for scientific name display
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - image_mushrooms.image_file_attachment.blob: For rendering images
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - image_mushrooms.part: Used in _image_card partial (lines 10, 15) for alt text
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  #
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   WARNING: Adding associations to views? Update this includes!
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Missing associations cause 500 errors in production due to strict_loading.
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ============================================================================
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushrooms = policy_scope(Mushroom)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Search by name, description, comments, city, genus (minimum 3 characters)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                  if params[:q].present? && params[:q].strip.length >= 3
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                    term_raw = params[:q].to_s.strip
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    term = ActiveRecord::Base.sanitize_sql_like(term_raw)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                    if term_raw =~ /\A\d+\z/
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Exact ID match
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                      @mushrooms = @mushrooms.where("mushrooms.id = ?", term_raw.to_i)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Search across multiple fields
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                      @mushrooms = @mushrooms
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                        .left_joins(:genera)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                        .where(
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                          "mushrooms.name LIKE ? OR mushrooms.description LIKE ? OR mushrooms.comments LIKE ? OR mushrooms.city LIKE ? OR genera.name LIKE ?",
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                          "%#{term}%", "%#{term}%", "%#{term}%", "%#{term}%", "%#{term}%"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                        )
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushrooms = @mushrooms
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                                 .includes(:fungus_type, :country, :state, :genera, :species,
          
      69.

                @mushroom = Mushroom.new
          
      113.

                # Set collection date to today by default

                @mushroom.collection_date = Date.today
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                # If copying location from another mushroom, use that mushroom's location
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:copy_location_from].present?
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  source_mushroom = current_user.mushrooms.find_by(id: params[:copy_location_from])
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  if source_mushroom
          
      121.

                    @mushroom.country_id = source_mushroom.country_id
          
      122.

      125.
