      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                # Otherwise, pre-populate with user's default location preferences if set
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif current_user.default_country_id.present?
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom.country_id = current_user.default_country_id
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom.state_id = current_user.default_state_id if current_user.default_state_id.present?
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom.city = current_user.default_city if current_user.default_city.present?
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom.county = current_user.default_county if current_user.default_county.present?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @mushroom
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /mushrooms or /mushrooms.json
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

              def create
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom = current_user.mushrooms.build(mushroom_params.except(:user_id))
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @mushroom # Authorize before saving
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom.save
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to new_image_mushroom_path(mushroom_id: @mushroom.id), notice: "Mushroom was successfully created. Now add an image."
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /mushrooms/1/edit
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

              def edit
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                # set_mushroom before_action already loads the mushroom with basic associations
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                # Reload with additional associations needed for edit view
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom = Mushroom
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                              .includes(:genera, :species, :trees, :plants, :fungus_type,
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                                        image_mushrooms: [:part, { image_file_attachment: :blob }],
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                                        mr_character_mushrooms: { mr_character: [:part, :display_option, :source_data] })
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                              .find(params[:id])
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @mushroom
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if fungus_type exists (data integrity check)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom.fungus_type.nil?
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error("Mushroom #{@mushroom.id} has invalid fungus_type_id: #{@mushroom.fungus_type_id}")
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to mushrooms_path, alert: "Cannot edit mushroom: invalid fungus type. Please contact an administrator."
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to mushrooms_path, alert: "Mushroom not found."
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /mushrooms/1/edit_characters?observation_method_id=X&part_id=Y
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

              def edit_characters
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                @observation_method = ObservationMethod.find(params[:observation_method_id])
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                @part = Part.find(params[:part_id])
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get all characters for this observation_method + part combination
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter by fungus_type if set (includes universal characters with fungus_type_id = NULL)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom.fungus_type_id.present?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  @characters = MrCharacter
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .for_fungus_type(@mushroom.fungus_type_id)
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .where(observation_method: @observation_method, part: @part)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .includes(:display_option, :source_data, :lookup_items)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .order(:name)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  @characters = MrCharacter
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .where(observation_method: @observation_method, part: @part)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .includes(:display_option, :source_data, :lookup_items)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                                  .order(:name)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @mushroom
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound => e
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to edit_mushroom_path(@mushroom), alert: "#{e.message}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

              # PATCH/PUT /mushrooms/1 or /mushrooms/1.json
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

              def update
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                # ============================================================================
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                # SECURITY: Prevent mass assignment of user_id
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                # ============================================================================
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                # Users should only be able to update their own mushrooms (enforced by Pundit policy).
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                # This line ensures user_id cannot be changed via form tampering.
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                filtered_params = mushroom_params.except(:user_id)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom.update(filtered_params)
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to @mushroom, notice: "Mushroom was successfully updated."
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ============================================================================
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  # PERFORMANCE: Reload with eager loading to avoid N+1 queries in edit form
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ============================================================================
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  # When validation fails, we need to re-render the edit form. The form uses
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                  # associations (genera, mr_characters, etc.) that trigger strict_loading violations
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  # if not preloaded. This single query fetches all required associations.
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                  #
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  #   WARNING: Do NOT add duplicate queries here (was causing performance issues)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                  # This one comprehensive query replaces 4 duplicate queries that were here before.
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                  #
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ASSOCIATIONS LOADED:
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - genera: For genus selection dropdown
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - mr_characters: Character traits assigned to this mushroom
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - mr_characters.genera: Genus associations for each character
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                  # - mr_characters.part, observation_method, color, source_data: Character metadata
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                  # ============================================================================
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  @mushroom = Mushroom.includes(:genera, mr_characters: [:genera, :part, :observation_method, :color, :source_data]).find(@mushroom.id)
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

              # DELETE /mushrooms/1 or /mushrooms/1.json
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

              def destroy
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                # Temporarily disable strict_loading for this mushroom
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom.strict_loading!(false) if @mushroom.respond_to?(:strict_loading!)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom.destroy
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to mushrooms_path, notice: "Mushroom was successfully deleted."
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

              # GET /mushrooms/export.pdf or /mushrooms/:id/export.pdf
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

              def export_pdf
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                # Determine which mushrooms to export
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                if params[:id].present?
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Single mushroom export
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                  mushroom = Mushroom
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                               .includes(:country, :state, :fungus_type, :genera, :species, :trees, :plants,
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                                         image_mushrooms: { image_file_attachment: :blob },
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                                         mr_character_mushrooms: { mr_character: [:part, :display_option] })
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                               .find(params[:id])
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                  authorize mushroom
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                  mushrooms = [mushroom]
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                  filename = "#{mushroom.name.parameterize}-#{Date.today}.pdf"
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif params[:ids].present?
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Multiple specific mushrooms
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

                  mushrooms = policy_scope(Mushroom)
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            
              
            

                                .includes(:country, :state, :fungus_type, :genera, :species, :trees, :plants,
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
            

                                          image_mushrooms: { image_file_attachment: :blob },
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
            

                                          mr_character_mushrooms: { mr_character: [:part, :display_option] })
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                                .where(id: params[:ids])
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                                .order(:name)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
            

                  filename = "mushrooms-export-#{Date.today}.pdf"
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            
              
            

                  # All user's mushrooms
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            
              
            

                  mushrooms = policy_scope(Mushroom)
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            
              
            

                                .includes(:country, :state, :fungus_type, :genera, :species, :trees, :plants,
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            
              
            

                                          image_mushrooms: { image_file_attachment: :blob },
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
            

                                          mr_character_mushrooms: { mr_character: [:part, :display_option] })
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                                .order(:name)
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                  filename = "all-mushrooms-#{Date.today}.pdf"
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
            

                # Generate PDF
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            
              
            

                pdf = MushroomPdfService.new(mushrooms).generate
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                # Send PDF
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            
              
            

                send_data pdf.render,
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            
              
            

                          filename: filename,
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            
              
            

                          type: 'application/pdf',
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            
              
            

                          disposition: 'attachment'
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to mushrooms_path, alert: 'Mushroom not found.'
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            
              
            

              # POST /mushrooms/:id/clone_characters
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            
              
            

              def clone_characters
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            
              
            

                authorize @mushroom
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            
              
            

                source_id = params[:source_mushroom_id]
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            
              
            

                if source_id.blank?
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to edit_mushroom_path(@mushroom), alert: 'Please select a mushroom to clone from.'
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                source_mushroom = Mushroom.includes(:mr_character_mushrooms).find(source_id)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if source is accessible (either user's own or a template)
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                unless source_mushroom.user_id == current_user.id || source_mushroom.is_template?
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to edit_mushroom_path(@mushroom), alert: 'You do not have permission to clone from that mushroom.'
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                # Temporarily disable strict loading for the cloning operation
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom.strict_loading!(false) if @mushroom.respond_to?(:strict_loading!)
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                if @mushroom.clone_characters_from(source_mushroom)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                  character_count = source_mushroom.mr_character_mushrooms.count
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to edit_mushroom_path(@mushroom),
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            
              
            

                              notice: "Successfully cloned #{character_count} characters from #{source_mushroom.name}."
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to edit_mushroom_path(@mushroom),
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            
              
            

                              alert: 'Failed to clone characters. Please try again.'
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            
              
            

                redirect_to edit_mushroom_path(@mushroom), alert: 'Source mushroom not found.'
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      314.

              def set_mushroom
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            
              
            

                @mushroom = Mushroom
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                              .includes(:country, :state, :fungus_type, :genera, :species, :trees, :plants, image_mushrooms: { image_file_attachment: :blob })
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

                              .find(params[:id])
          
      336.

                authorize @mushroom
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337.

              # - This prevents users from assigning mushrooms to other users

            class StatesController < ApplicationController

              def index

              def trusted_device_valid?(user)

              def device_fingerprint
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create a fingerprint from user agent and IP
          
      50.

                # Note: This is a simple implementation. Consider using a JS library
          
      51.

                # like fingerprintjs2 for more robust device identification
          
      52.

            class Users::TwoFactorSettingsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              def enable
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                if current_user.otp_required_for_login?
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                  redirect_to edit_user_registration_path, alert: '2FA is already enabled.'

                  return
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      11.

      12.

                begin
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Regenerate OTP secret for security
          
      14.

                  current_user.otp_secret = User.generate_otp_secret
          
      15.

                    # Store that we're in setup mode
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                    session[:enabling_otp] = true
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to edit_user_registration_path, notice: 'Scan the QR code and enter a verification code to enable 2FA.'
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                    redirect_to edit_user_registration_path, alert: "Failed to enable 2FA: #{current_user.errors.full_messages.join(', ')}"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      24.

                  Rails.logger.error "2FA Enable Error: #{e.message}\n#{e.backtrace.join("\n")}"
          
      25.

                  redirect_to edit_user_registration_path, alert: "Failed to enable 2FA. Please contact support if this persists."
          
      26.

                end
          
      27.

      28.

              def verify

                if otp_attempt.blank?

                  redirect_to edit_user_registration_path, alert: 'Please enter the verification code.'

                  return
          
      35.

      36.

                # Verify the OTP code
          
      38.

                if current_user.validate_and_consume_otp!(otp_attempt)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Enable 2FA
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

      41.

            module ColorsHelper

              def color_thumb(color_id, size: 24, extra_classes: "")

              def display_option_key(character)

              # LookupItem options for radio/drop-down, returns [[label, value], ...]
          
      18.

              def lookup_options_for(character)
          
      19.

                LookupItem.where(mr_character_id: character.id).order(:name).pluck(:name, :id)
          
      20.

      21.

              # Render an input for a given character based on its display option.

              def input_for_character(form:, character:, current_value: nil)

    24. 
            

            
              
            

                key = display_option_key(character)

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                case key
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                when "color", "6"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                  content_tag(:span, "Use color picker below", class: "text-xs text-gray-500")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                when "radio", "9"

    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  options = lookup_options_for(character)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  return content_tag(:span, "No options", class: "text-xs text-gray-500") if options.blank?
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  content_tag(:div, class: "flex flex-col gap-1") do
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    options.map do |label, value|
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                      id = "#{character.id}-#{value}"
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                      content_tag(:label, for: id, class: "inline-flex items-center gap-2") do
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                        form.radio_button(:character_value, value, id: id, checked: current_value.to_s == value.to_s) +
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                          content_tag(:span, label.to_s, class: "text-sm")
          
      39.

      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                    end.join.html_safe

                  end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                when "drop-down", "10"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  options = lookup_options_for(character)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  return content_tag(:span, "No options", class: "text-xs text-gray-500") if options.blank?
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                  form.select(
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                    :character_value,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                    options_for_select(options, current_value),
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                    { include_blank: "Select..." },
          
      50.

      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                when "text_box_number_mm", "text_box_number_um", "text_box_number", "2", "3", "4"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  form.number_field :character_value, step: "any", class: "border rounded px-2 py-1 text-sm w-full max-w-xs", value: current_value
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                when "text_box_string", "5"
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  form.text_field :character_value, class: "border rounded px-2 py-1 text-sm w-full max-w-xs", value: current_value
          
      56.

                when "taste", "7", "odor", "8"
          
      57.

                  # Until you define strict vocabularies, use a text field (can later swap to lookup)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  form.text_field :character_value, class: "border rounded px-2 py-1 text-sm w-full max-w-xs", value: current_value, placeholder: key
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                when "state", "11", "country", "12"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Already handled elsewhere in your app; show hint only
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  content_tag(:span, "Handled in location inputs", class: "text-xs text-gray-500")
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Sensible fallback
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  form.text_field :character_value, class: "border rounded px-2 py-1 text-sm w-full max-w-xs", value: current_value
          
      65.

    app/jobs/application_job.rb

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2.

      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            end

    app/jobs/compare_mushrooms_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    62 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 62 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class CompareMushroomsJob < ApplicationJob
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              queue_as :default
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              # Minimum number of characters required for meaningful comparison
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

              MINIMUM_CHARACTERS = 10
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              # Number of mushroom pairs to process per batch
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              BATCH_SIZE = 100
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              # ============================================================================
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              # COMPARE MUSHROOMS JOB
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

              # ============================================================================
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              # Asynchronously compares mushrooms based on their character values.
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

              # PARAMETERS:
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

              # - mushroom_id: ID of mushroom to compare against all others
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

              # - batch_offset: Starting offset for pagination (default: 0)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              # BEHAVIOR:
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Only compares mushrooms with minimum character count
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Processes in batches to avoid memory issues
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Recursively enqueues next batch if more comparisons remain
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Updates or creates MushroomComparison records
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              #
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              # PERFORMANCE:
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Uses batching to prevent timeout
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Eager loads character data to minimize queries
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

              # - Skips comparisons that already exist and are recent
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

              # ============================================================================
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform(mushroom_id, batch_offset: 0)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                mushroom = Mushroom.find(mushroom_id)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if mushroom has minimum characters
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                character_count = mushroom.mr_character_mushrooms.count
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                if character_count < MINIMUM_CHARACTERS
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Mushroom #{mushroom_id} has only #{character_count} characters. Minimum is #{MINIMUM_CHARACTERS}."
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  return
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                # Load character values for the primary mushroom
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                primary_characters = load_character_values(mushroom)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get all other mushrooms with minimum characters (excluding self)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                other_mushrooms = Mushroom
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .where.not(id: mushroom_id)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .with_minimum_characters(MINIMUM_CHARACTERS)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .offset(batch_offset)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                                    .limit(BATCH_SIZE)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                other_mushrooms.each do |compared_mushroom|
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  compare_pair(mushroom, compared_mushroom, primary_characters)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                # If there are more mushrooms to process, enqueue next batch
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                if other_mushrooms.size == BATCH_SIZE
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  CompareMushroomsJob.perform_later(mushroom_id, batch_offset: batch_offset + BATCH_SIZE)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

              def compare_pair(mushroom, compared_mushroom, primary_characters)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                # Find or create comparison record
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                comparison = MushroomComparison.find_or_initialize_by(
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  mushroom_id: mushroom.id,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  compared_mushroom_id: compared_mushroom.id
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Load character values for compared mushroom
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  compared_characters = load_character_values(compared_mushroom)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Calculate Jaccard similarity
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  similarity_result = calculate_jaccard_similarity(primary_characters, compared_characters)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Update comparison with results
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  comparison.mark_completed!(
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    similarity_result[:score],
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    similarity_result[:matching],
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                    similarity_result[:total]
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue StandardError => e
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Failed to compare mushrooms #{mushroom.id} and #{compared_mushroom.id}: #{e.message}"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  comparison.mark_failed! if comparison.persisted?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

              def load_character_values(mushroom)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                # Returns hash: { mr_character_id => character_value }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                mushroom.mr_character_mushrooms.pluck(:mr_character_id, :character_value).to_h
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

              def calculate_jaccard_similarity(set_a, set_b)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create sets of (character_id, value) tuples for accurate comparison
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                pairs_a = set_a.to_a.to_set
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                pairs_b = set_b.to_a.to_set
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                # Calculate intersection and union
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                intersection = pairs_a & pairs_b
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                union = pairs_a | pairs_b
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                return { score: 0, matching: 0, total: 0 } if union.empty?
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                matching_count = intersection.size
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                total_count = union.size
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                similarity_percentage = ((matching_count.to_f / total_count) * 100).round
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  score: similarity_percentage,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  matching: matching_count,
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  total: total_count
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      118.
